OffensiveMoves.Name: Tackle
OffensiveMoves.Description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Headbutt
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user sticks its head out and attacks by charging straight into the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Hyper Beam
OffensiveMoves.Description: A highly destructive beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Quick Attack
OffensiveMoves.Description: An almost invisibly fast attack that is certain to strike first.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Giga Impact
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Defense Curl
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Endurance.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Rest
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and cures any status conditions.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Protect
DefensiveMoves.Description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Chance of failing rises if used in succession.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Detect
DefensiveMoves.Description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Chance of failing rises if used in succession.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Endure
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Chance of failing rises if used in succession.

SupportMoves.Name: Growl
SupportMoves.Description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing monsters less wary and lowering their Strength.

SupportMoves.Name: Helping Hand
SupportMoves.Description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

SupportMoves.Name: Encore
SupportMoves.Description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Tail Whip
SupportMoves.Description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing monsters less wary and lowering their Endurance.

SupportMoves.Name: Roar
SupportMoves.Description: The target is scared off and replaced by another monster in its party.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Ember
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Flamethrower
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Fire Blast
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Fire Punch
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is punched with a fiery fist.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Flare Blitz
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user receives recoil damage.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Will-O-Wisp
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Fire Spin
DefensiveMoves.Description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Flame Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user cloaks itself with fire, reducing damage from Physical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Sunny Day
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Heat Wave
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing monsters.

SupportMoves.Name: Overheat
SupportMoves.Description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Intelligence.

SupportMoves.Name: Inferno
SupportMoves.Description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

SupportMoves.Name: Fire Fang
SupportMoves.Description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs.

SupportMoves.Name: Lava Plume
SupportMoves.Description: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all monsters in battle.

SupportMoves.Name: Burning Terrain
SupportMoves.Description: The user changes the terrain to Burning Terrain for five turns.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Water Gun
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Hydro Pump
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Aqua Tail
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Surf
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Waterfall
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user crashes into the target with the force of a mighty waterfall.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Aqua Ring
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Withdraw
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Endurance.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Rain Dance
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Soak
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Bubble Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a protective bubble that reduces damage from Magical attacks.

SupportMoves.Name: Heal Current
SupportMoves.Description: The user channels healing waters to restore an ally's HP.

SupportMoves.Name: Water Sport
SupportMoves.Description: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Whirlpool
SupportMoves.Description: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Aqua Veil
SupportMoves.Description: A veil of water prevents status conditions for the user's team for five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Calm Tide
SupportMoves.Description: The user calms its mind to boost its Intelligence and Fortitude.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Thunder Shock
OffensiveMoves.Description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Thunderbolt
OffensiveMoves.Description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Thunder
OffensiveMoves.Description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Volt Tackle
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user electrifies itself to tackle the target. The user receives recoil damage.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Wild Charge
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Thunder Wave
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user launches a weak electric charge that paralyzes the target.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Charge
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user boosts the power of its Thunder-type moves and raises its Fortitude.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Magnetic Flux
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user manipulates magnetic fields to raise the Fortitude and Endurance of allies.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Electric Terrain
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, boosting Thunder-type moves.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Magnet Rise
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism.

SupportMoves.Name: Electro Ball
SupportMoves.Description: The user hurls an electric orb. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

SupportMoves.Name: Volt Switch
SupportMoves.Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party monster.

SupportMoves.Name: Parabolic Charge
SupportMoves.Description: The user attacks everything around it and restores HP equal to half the damage dealt.

SupportMoves.Name: Eerie Impulse
SupportMoves.Description: The user's eerie impulse sharply lowers the target's Intelligence.

SupportMoves.Name: Discharge
SupportMoves.Description: A flare of electricity damages all nearby monsters. May cause paralysis.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Vine Whip
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is struck with slender, whip-like vines.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Razor Leaf
OffensiveMoves.Description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing monsters.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Energy Ball
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Giga Drain
OffensiveMoves.Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Leaf Storm
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. Harshly lowers the user's Intelligence.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Synthesis
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Leech Seed
DefensiveMoves.Description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals HP from the target every turn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Ingrain
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user lays roots that restore its HP every turn. It can't switch out.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Spiky Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: Protects the user and damages any opponent that makes direct contact.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Cotton Guard
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, boosting Endurance sharply.

SupportMoves.Name: Sleep Powder
SupportMoves.Description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

SupportMoves.Name: Stun Spore
SupportMoves.Description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

SupportMoves.Name: Aromatherapy
SupportMoves.Description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals status conditions of all allies.

SupportMoves.Name: Grassy Terrain
SupportMoves.Description: The ground turns to grass for five turns, restoring HP of monsters on the ground.

SupportMoves.Name: Growth
SupportMoves.Description: The user stimulates its own growth, boosting Strength and Intelligence.

Effects.SpecialNote: Boosts increase to +2 under Harsh Sunlight

OffensiveMoves.Name: Ice Beam
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user fires a beam of freezing energy at the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Ice Punch
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user delivers a freezing punch that may freeze the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Blizzard
OffensiveMoves.Description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing monsters.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Frost Breath
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user exhales a breath of cold air that always results in a critical hit.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Avalanche
OffensiveMoves.Description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Haze
DefensiveMoves.Description: Creates a black haze that eliminates every stat change among all monsters in battle.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Mist
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents stat reductions.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Ice Barrier
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a wall of ice to sharply raise its Fortitude.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Subzero Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: Envelops the user in freezing air, reducing damage from Magical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Snow Cloak
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user cloaks itself in snow, increasing its Evasion.

SupportMoves.Name: Hail
SupportMoves.Description: Summons a hailstorm that damages all monsters except Ice types.

SupportMoves.Name: Freeze-Dry
SupportMoves.Description: An Ice-type attack that's super effective against Water types and may freeze the target.

SupportMoves.Name: Aurora Veil
SupportMoves.Description: Reduces damage from both Physical and Magical attacks for five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Icicle Crash
SupportMoves.Description: The user drops large icicles on the target to inflict damage.

SupportMoves.Name: Sheer Cold
SupportMoves.Description: A chilling attack that causes fainting in a single hit.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Force Punch
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user delivers a powerful punch infused with force energy.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Pressure Slam
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user slams the target with overwhelming force, potentially lowering the target's Endurance.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Gravity Well
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a gravitational field to crush the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Force Wave
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user unleashes a wave of force that damages all adjacent enemies.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Impact Blast
OffensiveMoves.Description: A concentrated burst of force energy is fired at the target.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Kinetic Barrier
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a barrier of kinetic energy, boosting its Endurance.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Momentum Shift
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user manipulates force to reduce damage from Physical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Inertia Guard
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user increases its own mass temporarily, sharply boosting Fortitude.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Gravity Shift
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user alters gravity around itself, making it immune to Ground-based moves.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Pressure Field
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user generates a field of force that reduces opponents' Agility.

SupportMoves.Name: Force Boost
SupportMoves.Description: The user concentrates to increase its Strength and Intelligence.

SupportMoves.Name: Recoil Strike
SupportMoves.Description: A risky attack that deals massive damage but hurts the user significantly.

SupportMoves.Name: Force Exchange
SupportMoves.Description: The user swaps its Strength and Fortitude stats with the target.

SupportMoves.Name: Gravitational Pull
SupportMoves.Description: Forces the target to stay in battle, preventing switching.

SupportMoves.Name: Forceful Return
SupportMoves.Description: The user returns to its team, forcing the opponent to switch as well.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Poison Jab
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Sludge Bomb
OffensiveMoves.Description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Cross Poison
OffensiveMoves.Description: A slashing attack with poisonous blades that has a high critical-hit ratio.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Gunk Shot
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Venoshock
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power doubles if the target is poisoned.

Effects.SpecialBehavior: Power doubles if the target is already poisoned

DefensiveMoves.Name: Toxic
DefensiveMoves.Description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Acid Armor
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising Endurance.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Poison Guard
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user surrounds itself with a poisonous barrier, reducing damage from Physical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Venom Drench
DefensiveMoves.Description: Lowers the Strength, Intelligence, and Agility of poisoned targets.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Purify
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user heals the target's status condition, restoring its own HP in the process.

SupportMoves.Name: Toxic Spikes
SupportMoves.Description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opponent's feet.

Effects.FieldEffect: Sets a hazard that poisons enemies upon entering the battlefield

SupportMoves.Name: Baneful Bunker
SupportMoves.Description: Protects the user and poisons any opponent that makes direct contact.

SupportMoves.Name: Corrosive Gas
SupportMoves.Description: The user surrounds everything with a poisonous gas that corrodes held items.

Effects.ItemEffect: Removes held items from all adjacent monsters

SupportMoves.Name: Gastro Acid
SupportMoves.Description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the target's ability.

SupportMoves.Name: Clear Smog
SupportMoves.Description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Earthquake
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user causes a massive earthquake that strikes all adjacent monsters.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Dig
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user burrows underground on the first turn and attacks on the next.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Bulldoze
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user stomps down on the ground, damaging everything around and lowering their Agility.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Mud-Slap
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its Accuracy.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Fissure
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground to drop the target in. It causes a one-hit KO.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Sandstorm
DefensiveMoves.Description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all monsters except Earth, Stone, and Metal types.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Mud Sport
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user covers the ground with mud, weakening Thunder-type moves.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Shore Up
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user regains HP. The amount of HP regained increases during a sandstorm.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Earth Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user raises a protective barrier of earth, boosting its Endurance.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Stealth Rock
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team.

SupportMoves.Name: Sand Attack
SupportMoves.Description: The user kicks sand at the target to reduce its Accuracy.

SupportMoves.Name: Magnitude
SupportMoves.Description: The user generates a ground tremor of random intensity.

SupportMoves.Name: Rototiller
SupportMoves.Description: Tills the soil to boost the Strength and Intelligence of Plant-type monsters.

SupportMoves.Name: Earth Power
SupportMoves.Description: The user makes the ground erupt with power. May lower the target's Fortitude.

SupportMoves.Name: Gravity
SupportMoves.Description: Increases the gravity for five turns, preventing monsters from using moves that involve flying.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Air Slash
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Hurricane
OffensiveMoves.Description: A powerful wind attack that may confuse the target.
OffensiveMoves.SpecialNote: Accuracy increases to 100 during Rain; decreases to 50 during Harsh Sunlight

OffensiveMoves.Name: Aerial Ace
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Gust
OffensiveMoves.Description: A strong wind is whipped up to inflict damage.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Sky Attack
OffensiveMoves.Description: A two-turn attack that strikes with a high critical-hit ratio and may cause flinching.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Tailwind
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Agility of all allies.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Feather Dance
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user covers the target with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Strength.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Air Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user manipulates wind currents to form a protective barrier, reducing damage from Magical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Defog
DefensiveMoves.Description: A strong wind blows away obstacles like barriers and field effects.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Roost
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user lands and rests its body, restoring its own HP.

Effects.SpecialEffect: User loses Wind typing until end of turn

SupportMoves.Name: Whirlwind
SupportMoves.Description: The target is blown away, and a different monster is dragged out.

SupportMoves.Name: Mirror Move
SupportMoves.Description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

SupportMoves.Name: Razor Wind
SupportMoves.Description: A two-turn attack that strikes with a blade of wind. High critical-hit ratio.

SupportMoves.Name: Air Cutter
SupportMoves.Description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing team.

SupportMoves.Name: Tailwind Burst
SupportMoves.Description: The user creates a sudden gust that sharply boosts an ally's Agility.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Psychic
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Psybeam
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user fires a peculiar ray that may cause confusion.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Zen Headbutt
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and rams the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Psycho Cut
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic energy. High critical-hit ratio.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Future Sight
OffensiveMoves.Description: Two turns after this move is used, a powerful psychic attack hits the target.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Calm Mind
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Intelligence and Fortitude.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Barrier
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a powerful protective barrier, sharply raising its Fortitude.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Reflect
DefensiveMoves.Description: A wall of light is put up to weaken the power of Physical attacks for five turns.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Magic Coat
DefensiveMoves.Description: A barrier reflects back to the opponent moves like status conditions and stat reductions.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Light Screen
DefensiveMoves.Description: A wall of light is put up to weaken the power of Magical attacks for five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Hypnosis
SupportMoves.Description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to put the target to sleep.

SupportMoves.Name: Teleport
SupportMoves.Description: The user switches places with another monster, escaping from battle if in the wild.

SupportMoves.Name: Trick Room
SupportMoves.Description: A distorted space is created where slower monsters move first for five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Heal Block
SupportMoves.Description: Prevents the target from using moves or items that recover HP for five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Role Play
SupportMoves.Description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's ability.

OffensiveMoves.Name: X-Scissor
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were scissors.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Bug Buzz
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Megahorn
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user attacks by pricking the target with a large horn.

OffensiveMoves.Name: U-turn
OffensiveMoves.Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party monster.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Leech Life
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user drains the target's vitality. The user's HP is restored by half the damage dealt.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Protect
DefensiveMoves.Description: Enables the user to evade all attacks for one turn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Iron Carapace
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Endurance.

DefensiveMoves.Name: String Shot
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user shoots silk to entangle its enemies, lowering their Agility.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Defend Order
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user calls out to its underlings to shield it, boosting Endurance and Fortitude.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Quiver Dance
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user performs a mystical dance to boost Intelligence, Fortitude, and Agility.

SupportMoves.Name: Sticky Web
SupportMoves.Description: The user weaves a sticky net that lowers the Agility of opposing monsters upon entering battle.

SupportMoves.Name: Infestation
SupportMoves.Description: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Heal Order
SupportMoves.Description: The user calls on its underlings to heal it.

SupportMoves.Name: Toxic Thread
SupportMoves.Description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower its Agility.

SupportMoves.Name: Fell Stinger
SupportMoves.Description: If this move knocks out a target, it sharply raises the user's Strength.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Rock Slide
OffensiveMoves.Description: Large boulders are hurled at opposing monsters to inflict damage.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Stone Edge
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Ancient Power
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Rock Blast
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target two to five times in a row.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Power Gem
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user attacks with rays of light that sparkle like gemstones.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Sandstorm
DefensiveMoves.Description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all monsters except Earth, Stone, and Metal types.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Rock Polish
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag, sharply raising its Agility.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Stealth Rock
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Stone Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a shield of rocks, boosting its Endurance.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Wide Guard
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

SupportMoves.Name: Sand Tomb
SupportMoves.Description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for several turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Gravity
SupportMoves.Description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and lowering Evasion.

SupportMoves.Name: Rock Tomb
SupportMoves.Description: Boulders are hurled at the target to inflict damage and lower its Agility.

SupportMoves.Name: Smack Down
SupportMoves.Description: Throws a stone or projectile to knock the target down to the ground.

SupportMoves.Name: Shell Smash
SupportMoves.Description: The user breaks its protective shell, lowering Endurance and Fortitude but sharply boosting Strength, Intelligence, and Agility.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Shadow Ball
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user hurls a shadowy orb at the target to inflict damage.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Shadow Claw
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user slashes with sharp claws cloaked in shadows.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Hex
OffensiveMoves.Description: A relentless attack that deals massive damage to a target affected by a status condition.

Effects.SpecialBehavior: Power doubles if the target has a status condition

OffensiveMoves.Name: Shadow Sneak
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target. This move always goes first.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Phantom Force
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user vanishes on the first turn, then strikes on the next. Can hit through protective moves.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Curse
DefensiveMoves.Description: A move that works differently for Spirit-type monsters. The user sacrifices HP to curse the target.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Will-O-Wisp
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Shadow Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user envelops itself in shadows, reducing damage from Magical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Pain Split
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined total.

Effects.HPAdjustment: Average current HP between user and target

DefensiveMoves.Name: Destiny Bond
DefensiveMoves.Description: If the user faints, the opponent that dealt the finishing blow also faints.

SupportMoves.Name: Trick-or-Treat
SupportMoves.Description: The user adds the Spirit type to the target's type.

Effects.TypeChange: Adds Spirit type to target's existing type(s)

SupportMoves.Name: Disable
SupportMoves.Description: For several turns, this move prevents the target from using its last used move.

SupportMoves.Name: Mean Look
SupportMoves.Description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look, preventing it from escaping.

VolatileStatus.Duration: Until User Faints or Switches Out

SupportMoves.Name: Perish Song
SupportMoves.Description: Any monster that hears this song faints in three turns unless it switches out.

SupportMoves.Name: Confuse Ray
SupportMoves.Description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Dragon Claw
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user slashes the target with sharp dragon claws.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Dragon Pulse
OffensiveMoves.Description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Outrage
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns, then becomes confused.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Dragon Tail
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another monster.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Dual Chop
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user attacks the target by swinging its arms twice in succession.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Dragon Dance
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Strength and Agility.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Protect
DefensiveMoves.Description: Enables the user to evade all attacks for one turn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Scale Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user hardens its scales, boosting its Endurance and Fortitude.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Dragon Barrier
DefensiveMoves.Description: A mystical barrier that reduces damage from Magical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Safeguard
DefensiveMoves.Description: A mystical force prevents the user's team from receiving status conditions for five turns.

SupportMoves.Name: Roar
SupportMoves.Description: The target is scared off, and a different monster is dragged out.

SupportMoves.Name: Dragon Breath
SupportMoves.Description: The user exhales a mighty gust that may paralyze the target.

SupportMoves.Name: Draco Meteor
SupportMoves.Description: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. Harshly lowers the user's Intelligence.

SupportMoves.Name: Dragon Roar
SupportMoves.Description: The user emits a powerful roar that lowers the Strength and Intelligence of all opposing monsters.

SupportMoves.Name: Dragon Tail
SupportMoves.Description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another monster.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Dark Pulse
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Night Slash
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. High critical-hit ratio.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Crunch
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. May lower the target's Endurance.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Pursuit
OffensiveMoves.Description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

Effects.SpecialBehavior: Power doubles if target is switching out

OffensiveMoves.Name: Foul Play
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user turns the target's power against it. Uses the target's Strength stat in damage calculation.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Taunt
DefensiveMoves.Description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only offensive moves for three turns.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Torment
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Dark Shield
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user envelops itself in a veil of darkness, reducing damage from Physical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Embargo
DefensiveMoves.Description: Prevents the target from using items for five turns.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Nasty Plot
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts, sharply raising its Intelligence.

SupportMoves.Name: Sucker Punch
SupportMoves.Description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack.

Effects.Condition: Only works if target is using an offensive move

SupportMoves.Name: Fake Tears
SupportMoves.Description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Fortitude.

SupportMoves.Name: Knock Off
SupportMoves.Description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing its use during the battle.

SupportMoves.Name: Memento
SupportMoves.Description: The user faints to harshly lower the target's Strength and Intelligence.

SupportMoves.Name: Snatch
SupportMoves.Description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the target attempts to use.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Iron Bash
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user strikes the target with a spinning, heavy metal arm.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Steel Slash
OffensiveMoves.Description: Sharp metallic blades slash at the target with precision.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Photon Beam
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user emits a concentrated beam of metallic energy at the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Metal Whip
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user lashes the target with a flexible metal appendage.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Quick Hammer
OffensiveMoves.Description: A swift metallic strike that often hits before the opponent can react.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Metal Fortify
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user hardens its body with metallic energy, sharply boosting Endurance.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Reflective Counter
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user absorbs the impact of an attack and retaliates with greater force.

Effects.SpecialBehavior: Deals 1.5 times the damage received from the last attack

DefensiveMoves.Name: Iron Barrier
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a metallic barrier, reducing damage from Physical attacks.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Magnetic Levitation
DefensiveMoves.Description: Using magnetic forces, the user hovers above the ground, becoming immune to Earth-type moves.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Sonic Screech
DefensiveMoves.Description: An ear-piercing metallic sound sharply reduces the target's Fortitude.

SupportMoves.Name: Head Smash
SupportMoves.Description: The user charges the target with a hardened head, potentially causing the target to flinch.

SupportMoves.Name: Gear Crush
SupportMoves.Description: The user attacks by clamping down on the target with heavy metal gears, hitting twice.

SupportMoves.Name: Metal Shift
SupportMoves.Description: The user reconfigures its body, raising Strength and sharply boosting Agility.

SupportMoves.Name: Weight Crush
SupportMoves.Description: The user slams into the target with its massive body. Damage increases the heavier the user is compared to the target.

Effects.SpecialBehavior: Power scales with weight difference between user and target

SupportMoves.Name: Momentum Spin
SupportMoves.Description: The user spins rapidly to attack. The slower the user compared to the target, the higher the damage inflicted.

Effects.SpecialBehavior: Power increases with greater Agility difference favoring slower users

OffensiveMoves.Name: Light Beam
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user fires a concentrated beam of pure light at the target.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Solar Blade
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user gathers light on the first turn and unleashes a powerful blade attack on the second.

Effects.Condition: No charge required under Harsh Sunlight

OffensiveMoves.Name: Dazzling Gleam
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user damages opposing monsters by emitting a powerful flash.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Photon Punch
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user delivers a punch infused with light energy.

OffensiveMoves.Name: Prismatic Laser
OffensiveMoves.Description: The user shoots a powerful laser. The user can't move on the next turn.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Light Screen
DefensiveMoves.Description: A wall of light is put up to weaken the power of Magical attacks for five turns.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Healing Light
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user bathes itself in soothing light, restoring its own HP.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Reflect
DefensiveMoves.Description: A barrier of light reduces damage from Physical attacks for five turns.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Luminous Barrier
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user creates a protective shield of light, boosting its Fortitude.

DefensiveMoves.Name: Purify
DefensiveMoves.Description: The user releases a purifying light that heals status conditions of itself and allies.

SupportMoves.Name: Sunny Day
SupportMoves.Description: The user intensifies the sun's rays to gain an advantage.

SupportMoves.Name: Illuminate
SupportMoves.Description: The user illuminates the area, boosting the Accuracy of all allies.

SupportMoves.Name: Moonlight
SupportMoves.Description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

SupportMoves.Name: Mirror Coat
SupportMoves.Description: A retaliation move that counters any Magical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Effects.SpecialBehavior: Reflects back double damage from Magical attacks taken this turn

SupportMoves.Name: Flash
SupportMoves.Description: A blinding light that reduces the target's Accuracy.
